data.message:
So the confusion keeps hurtin like a contusion, feels like my heart's bruisen and i'm coming to a conclusion, my thoughts & ambitions fusin , nothin seems to work no matter what i been usin, my life is the ignition & u r the key to start me , resting in ur arms is where my heart be . i'm tired of fighting clashes like lightning , wish the distance between us would atleast start tightning. the thought of loosing u is frightning . i say what i mean & mean what i say , maybe one day we'll both feel the same way...

If likin this then plz plz hit like on ma page fo original stuffs like raps, poems, shayris. 
HoW $!Ck ThE mU$!C !S
dun ignore, u'll like content in it.
